tool_description:
Access Chrono24 public data with our Scraper API for comprehensive product information retrieval such as Search Results and Watch information.

Supports: 
www.chrono24.de, www.chrono24.com, www.chrono24.ch, www.chrono24.pl, www.chrono24.com.gr, www.chrono24.fr, www.chrono24.co.uk, www.chrono24.at, www.chrono24.cz, www.chrono24.com.tr, www.chrono24.it, www.chrono24.ca, www.chrono24.be, www.chrono24.hu, www.chrono24.cn, www.chrono24.nl, www.chrono24.com.au, www.chrono24.dk, www.chrono24.com.hr,...
name: Chrono24
title: Chrono24

api_list.name: Watch Details

required_parameters.name: watchID
required_parameters.description: Can be accessed through the **Search Results** endpoint

api_list.name: Countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chrono241.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chrono241.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chrono241.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chrono241.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Models
api_list.description: Get models for a specific brand.

required_parameters.name: brandID
required_parameters.description: Can be accessed through the **Brands** endpoint.

import requests

api_list.name: Search Results
api_list.description: Need more data from the same source or other sources? [Contact Us](https://tally.so/r/mVzr7j)

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: Options: relevance, price_asc, price_desc, popular, most_recent

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Format: CountryID,CountryID,CountryID...
Can be accessed through the **Countries** endpoint.
**Multiple Values Allowed: value,value,value...etc.**

optional_parameters.name: delivery
optional_parameters.description:
Options: original_box_and_papers, original_papers, original_box
**Multiple Values Allowed: value,value,value...etc.**

optional_parameters.name: priceTo
optional_parameters.description: Maximum Price

optional_parameters.name: gender
optional_parameters.description: Options: men, women

optional_parameters.name: dialNumbers
optional_parameters.description:
Options: arabic, roman, nonumbers
**Multiple Values Allowed: value,value,value...etc.**

optional_parameters.name: models
optional_parameters.description:
Format: modelID,modelID,modelID...
Can be accessed through the **Models** endpoint.
**Multiple Values Allowed: value,value,value...etc.**

optional_parameters.name: stockInfo
optional_parameters.description:
Options: inStock, onOrder, onRequest
**Multiple Values Allowed: value,value,value...etc.**

optional_parameters.name: caseMaterials
optional_parameters.description:
Options: aluminum, bronze, carbon, ceramic, gold_steel, palladium, plastic, platinum, red_gold, rose_gold, silver, steel, tantalum, titanium, tungsten, white_gold, yellow_gold
**Multiple Values Allowed: value,value,value...etc.**

optional_parameters.name: usedOrNew
optional_parameters.description: Options: used, new

optional_parameters.name: sellerType
optional_parameters.description: Options: dealer, private

optional_parameters.name: lugWidths
optional_parameters.description:
Format: LugWidthValue,LugWidthValue,LugWidthValue...
**Make sure each value is a number.**
**Multiple Values Allowed: value,value,value...etc.**

optional_parameters.name: thickness
optional_parameters.description:
Format: ThicknessValue,ThicknessValue,ThicknessValue...
**Make sure each value is a number.**
**Multiple Values Allowed: value,value,value...etc.**

optional_parameters.name: year
optional_parameters.description:
Format: YearValue,YearValue,YearValue...
**Make sure each value is a number.**
**Multiple Values Allowed: value,value,value...etc.**

optional_parameters.name: crystalTypes
optional_parameters.description:
Options: glass, mineralglass, plastic, plexiglass, sapphire
**Multiple Values Allowed: value,value,value...etc.**

optional_parameters.name: watchTypes
optional_parameters.description:
Format: typeID,typeID,typeID...
Can be accessed through the **watchTypes** endpoint.
**Multiple Values Allowed: value,value,value...etc.**

optional_parameters.name: priceFrom
optional_parameters.description: Minimum Price

optional_parameters.name: movementTypes
optional_parameters.description:
Options: automatic, manual, quartz
**Multiple Values Allowed: value,value,value...etc.**

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search Term

optional_parameters.name: caseDiameters
optional_parameters.description:
Format: CaseDiameterValue,CaseDiameterValue,CaseDiameterValue...
**Make sure each value is a number.**
**Multiple Values Allowed: value,value,value...etc.**

optional_parameters.name: brands
optional_parameters.description:
Format: brandID,brandID,brandID...
Can be accessed through the **Brands** endpoint.
**Multiple Values Allowed: value,value,value...etc.**
